tool_description: Identifies significant astrological transit events by comparing current planetary positions against natal chart positions over a specified time period.

natal_planet_positions.description: Array of natal planet longitudes in degrees

transiting_planets.description: Planets to include in transit search

orb_tolerance.description: Orb tolerance for transit aspects in degrees

error_messages: Array length mismatch: natal_planet_positions and natal_planet_names must have same length
Invalid date range: End date must be after start date
Date range too large: Maximum search period is 2 years
Invalid natal positions: All positions must be between 0 and 360 degrees
Invalid orb tolerance: Must be between 0.5 and 10 degrees
Invalid transiting planets: Use standard planet names only
Invalid aspect types: Use conjunction, opposition, trine, square, sextile, or quincunx
usage: Provide natal chart data and date range for transit search. Optionally specify which planets and aspects to include. Returns chronological list of significant transit events.

transit_events.description: Array of transit event descriptions with dates

event_dates.description: Array of exact event dates in ISO format

event_count.description: Total number of transit events found
